SEARCH
Package com.coms309.isu_pulse_frontend.loginsignup

Class UserSession

java.lang.Object
com.coms309.isu_pulse_frontend.loginsignup.UserSession
public class UserSession extends Object
Singleton class to manage the user's session in the application. Handles user information, shared preferences, and WebSocket connections.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the singleton instance of UserSession

    • setNetId

      public void setNetId(String netId, android.content.Context context)
      Sets the NetID and saves it to shared preferences. Also initializes the WebSocket connection.
      Parameters:
      netId - the NetID to set
      context - the application context

    • setUserType

      public void setUserType(String userType, android.content.Context context)
      Sets the user type and saves it to shared preferences. Also initializes the WebSocket connection.
      Parameters:
      userType - the user type to set
      context - the application context

    • clearSession

      public void clearSession(android.content.Context context)
      Clears the current user session and removes data from shared preferences. Also disconnects the WebSocket connection.
      Parameters:
      context - the application context

    • initWebSocket

      private void initWebSocket()
      Initializes the WebSocket connection for announcements.

    • disconnectWebSocket

      public void disconnectWebSocket()
      Disconnects the WebSocket connection if it exists.
